name: Dark Connection
description:
Dark Connection This was made in one week for the "Lost Relic Games" Game Jam.

Dark connection is a puzzle game where you play as the only source of light in a dark world. A small creature is drawn to you as it fears the dark, so your job is to guide it to safety. 

Shine your light around each level to explore and discover it’s secrets, and complete the puzzles that lie within. Be aware of traps that can kill the creature though, as I’m sure he wouldn’t like that too much, now would he?

Disclaimer**

Although I got a web build working, for a better experience feel free to download the windows version. The web build has some light glitches, but it’s completely playable and shouldn’t really alter the experience.

I mapped the pause button to ‘M’ instead of ‘Esc’ on the web build so you can play full screen without it closing.

Controls 

  • Use mouse to move light around.
  • Press M (web build) / Esc to bring up Pause Menu.
  • Rest of the controls are taught to the player in game.
